Ashvin.text: Hey Mayank What's the plan for weekend
Hey Ashvin Nothing Much. Just regular shoppings and all
Let's play TT at my place.

Praveen.text: Thanks Dude.Plan for my marriage and let me know about your confirm tickets.
Ya Sure buddy. Will definitely come on time

Vishal.text: Hey buddy..we are planning for Shimla-Manali trip. Will you join
Hey Vicky. It's Superb. Will surely join. Let's discuss the plan
Ya Sure. We will meet some where and make the plan for it
Yes, Let's mee at my home and make the plan.

Maheep.text: Hi Mayank..I am coming to Pune this saturday for my CDEC paper
It's great. All the very best for it and will plan to meet
Ya Sure. I will meet you after my exam. Bye...
